attacks.name: Darkness Switch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Rocket's Mewtwo ex, and then switch all damage counters on Rocket's Mewtwo ex with those on the Defending Pokémon. (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
